Dimensions, Configurations, Features, Engine cc All New Used Ad English Login / Register NEW CARS Explore New Cars Electric Cars Mahindra BE 6 Mahindra XEV 9e Tata Harrier EV MG Windsor EV Tesla Model Y Tata Nexon EV All Electric Cars Popular Cars Hyundai Creta Defender Mahindra XUV 3XO Mahindra Thar ROXX Mahindra Scorpio Tata Nexon All Popular Cars Upcoming Cars New Launches Car Insurance Ad Popular Brands Maruti Cars Tata Cars Kia Cars Toyota Cars Hyundai Cars Mahindra Cars Compare Cars New Car Offers & Discounts Find Car Dealers Find EV Charging Stations Find Fuel Stations Check Fuel Prices Used cars Buy Used Cars Used Cars In Your City Ahmedabad Bangalore Chennai Delhi NCR Hyderabad Jaipur Kolkata Mumbai Pune More Cities Sell My Car Used Car Valuation Dealership Near Me News & Reviews News & Top stories Car Expert Reviews User Reviews Car Collection Tips & Advice Videos Video Reviews Visual Stories Select City Ad XUV 3XO Price Compare Offers Images Specs User Reviews 360 View Variants More Videos Mileage Colours XUV 3XO News FAQs Dealers Service Center Brochure XUV 3XO EMI Loan Second Hand XUV 3XO Mahindra XUV 3XO Specifications The Mahindra XUV 3XO has 1 Diesel Engine and 1 Petrol Engine on offer. The Diesel engine is 1498 cc while the Petrol engine is 1197 cc . It is available with Manual & Automatic transmission.Depending upon the variant and fuel type the XUV 3XO has a mileage of 17.96 to 20.6 kmpl. The XUV 3XO is a 5 seater 3 cylinder car and has length of 3990 mm, width of 1821 mm and a wheelbase of 2600. Read More 4.6 303 Reviews Shortlist Rs. 7.99 - 15.80 Lakh * EMI starts @ 21,545 View July Offers Ad Standout features of Mahindra XUV 3XO Soft touch material on dashboard and door pads. Panoramic sunroof - largest in the segment. Level 2 ADAS with features such as forward collision warning, adaptive cruise control. 1.2-litre turbo-petrol engine makes 130PS/230Nm most powerful in its class. Specifications, Review and Pricing - What Insider Skip to content What Insider Menu Menu Home Celebrity Singer YouTuber Entertainment News Exam Jobs Sports Auto Tools Calorie Calculator GPA Calculator Mortgage Calculator Federal Pension Calculator Sales Tax Calculator Height Calculator Estimate Your Childs Future Height How To Mahindra XUV 3XO: Specifications, Review and Pricing January 4, 2025 by Santosh Bhunia The Mahindra XUV 3XO continues to be a popular choice in the compact SUV segment, thanks to its blend of stylish design, powerful performance, and cutting-edge features. With its premium interior and robust powertrains, the XUV3OO caters to urban drivers and adventure seekers alike. Mahindra XUV 3XOSpecifications The Mahindra XUV 3XO is offered with both petrol and diesel engine options, making it a versatile choice: Engine Options : 1.2-liter turbo-petrol 1.5-liter turbo-diesel Power Output : Petrol: 110 PS and 200 Nm torque Diesel: 117 PS and 300 Nm torque Transmission : 6-speed manual 6-speed AMT (automated manual transmission) Drivetrain : Front-wheel drive (FWD) Fuel Economy : Petrol: ~17 km/l Diesel: ~20 km/l Mahindra XUV 3XOPrice The Mahindra XUV 3XO is competitively priced, offering great value for its features. Mahindra XUV 3XO on road price is 8,91,603. Base Variant : Starting at 8.50 lakh Top Variant : Up to 14.00 lakh (ex-showroom prices) Mahindra XUV 3XODimensions Despite its compact size, the Mahindra XUV 3XO offers ample cabin space and a commanding road presence: Length : 3995 mm Width : 1821 mm Height : 1627 mm Wheelbase : 2600 mm Ground Clearance : 180 mm Mahindra XUV 3XOInterior and Features The Mahindra XUV 3XO boasts a feature-rich interior that combines comfort, convenience, and technology: Seating : Five-passenger capacity with premium fabric or leatherette upholstery Infotainment : 7-inch touchscreen system with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto Connectivity : Built-in navigation, Bluetooth, and USB ports Climate Control : Dual-zone automatic climate control Sunroof : Available on higher trims Safety Features : Six airbags (top variant) Electronic Stability Program (ESP) ABS with EBD ISOFIX child seat mounts Mahindra XUV 3XOExterior Design The Mahindra XUV 3XO combines bold styling with functional elements: Front : Aggressive grille design with LED projector headlamps and DRLs Wheels : 16-inch alloy wheels (diamond-cut options on higher trims) Tail Lamps : LED wraparound design Paint Options : Multiple vibrant and dual-tone color schemes Mahindra XUV 3XOPerformance The Mahindra XUV 3XO delivers a confident and enjoyable driving experience, with its powerful engines and responsive handling: Ride Quality : Smooth over rough roads, thanks to a well-tuned suspension Steering : Light for city driving, with enough feedback for highways Driving Modes : Multi-drive modes to suit various conditions Mahindra XUV 3XOReview The Mahindra XUV 3XO stands out in the compact SUV market with its impressive safety features, robust performance, and stylish design. Here are its strengths and areas for improvement: Strengths Safety : Leading safety features, including a 5-star Global NCAP rating for adult occupant protection Performance : Powerful diesel engine with class-leading torque Features : Segment-first dual-zone climate control and other premium features Comfort : Spacious cabin with supportive seats and excellent noise insulation Weaknesses Boot Space : At 257 liters, it offers less luggage capacity than competitors Fuel Efficiency : Petrol variants could improve on mileage Price : Top-end variants are on the pricier side for the segment Verdict The Mahindra XUV 3XO is an excellent choice for those seeking a feature-packed, safe, and powerful compact SUV. While it faces competition from models like the Tata Nexon, Kia Sonet, and Hyundai Venue, its unique offerings like a powerful diesel engine and advanced safety features help it carve out its own niche. Whether for daily commutes or weeke', 'images': [{'url': 'https://whatinsider.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/front-left-side-47.webp', 'alt_text': 'Mahindra XUV 3XO', 'width': '789', 'height': '483', 'class': 'attachment-full size-full wp-post-image', 'confidence': 0.8999999999999999}], 'rank': 4}, {'url': 'https://www.autocarindia.com/auto-features/mahindra-xuv-3xo-price-variants-features-explained-431425', 'content': "Mahindra XUV 3XO price, variants, features explained | Autocar India All All Price News Reviews Features Specifications Images Videos All All Price News Reviews Features Specifications Images Videos Signup Login Find a Car Cars Compare Cars New Cars Upcoming Cars Car Price Car Loan Calculator Find a Bike Bikes Compare Bikes New New Bikes New Scooters Upcoming Upcoming Bikes Upcoming Scooters Electric Electric Bikes Electric Scooters Bike Price Bike Loan Calculator News Cars Bikes Motorsports Industry Marketplace Reviews Car First drive / Reviews Comparisons Video reviews Long-term reviews Bike First ride / Reviews Comparisons Video reviews Long-term reviews Features Features Travelogues Blogs Interviews Partner Content Galleries Videos Images Stories Advice Signup Login Change City Close Detect my Current Location Pick from Popular Cities Mumbai Bengaluru Delhi Pune Hyderabad Ahmedabad Chennai Kolkata Home Features Mahindra XUV 3XO price, variants, features explained Mahindra XUV 3XO price, variants, features explained The XUV 3XO recently added new RevX variants, which are offered with two turbo-petrol engine options. Published On Jul 10, 2025 04:21:00 PM 1,06,175 Views Follow us on By Saptarshi Mondal Share - The Mahindra XUV 3XO , formerly XUV300, was launched last year with all-new front and rear designs, a refreshed interior and more features, as well as new powertrain options. Currently priced from Rs 7.99 lakh to Rs 15.79 lakh, ex-showroom India, this Mahindra SUV is available in a total of 12 trim levels (see table below). In this feature, we take a closer look at what features and engine options you get with each trim. Mahindra XUV 3XO petrol variant prices (in Rs, lakh) Petrol-MT Petrol-AT Diesel-MT Diesel-AMT MX1 7.99 - - - RevX M 8.94 - - - RevX M(O) 9.44 - - - MX2 - - 9.99 - MX2 Pro 9.54 10.54 10.64 - MX3 9.74 11.40 10.99 11.79 MX3 Pro 9.99 11.69 11.56 - AX5 11.19 12.69 12.19 12.99 RevX A T-GDI 11.79 12.99 - - AX5L T-GDI 12.62 13.94 - - AX7 T-GDI 12.80 13.99 13.69 14.70 AX7L T-GDI 13.99 15.80 14.99 - Mahindra XUV 3XO variant-wise powertrains The XUV 3XO's engine options include a 111hp, 200Nm, 1.2-litre turbo-petrol engine, 131hp, 230Nm, 1.2-litre TGDI engine and 117hp, 300Nm, and 1.5-litre diesel engine.A 6-speed manual gearbox is standard with these engines.Also, both petrol engines get a 6-speed torque converter automatic gearbox, while the diesel XUV 3XO models come with a 6-speed AMT unit. The 111hp turbo-petrol engine is available on the MX1, RevX M, RevX M(O), MX2, MX2 Pro, MX3, MX3 Pro and the AX5 trims. Moving on, the 131hp turbo-petrol engine is available only on the top four trims - RevX A, AX5 L, AX7 and AX7 L. The diesel engine is available nearly across the board, starting from the fourth-from-base MX2 trim. Here's a look at the variant split of the new XUV 3XO. Mahindra XUV 3XO variant-wise features XUV 3XO MX1 Price: Rs 7.99 lakh; powertrain - 111hp turbo petrol-MT Halogen projector headlamps LED daytime running lamps LED indicator on wing mirrors, LED tail lamps 6 airbags Electronic Stability Control (ESC) 16-inch steel wheels Electrically adjustable wing mirrors Engine start/stop Front armrest with storage 60:40 split rear seat Rear AC vents Adjustable headrest for second row Seat belt reminder for all passengers 3-point seat belt for all passengers XUV 3XO RevX M Price: Rs 8.94 lakh; powertrain - 111hp turbo petrol-MT Features over MX1 Dual-tone roof Body-coloured grille Wheel covers Black Leatherette Seats 10.25-inch touchscreen 4 speakers Steering-mounted audio controls Remote keyless entry Mahindra XUV 3XO RevX M(O) Price: Rs 9.44 lakh; powertrain - 111hp turbo petrol-MT Features over RevX M Single-pane sunroof Mahindra XUV 3XO MX2 Price: Rs 9.99 lakh; engine options - 117hp diesel-MT Features over MX1 10.25-inch touchscreen 4 speakers Steering-mounted controls Remote keyless entry Mahindra XUV 3XO MX2 Pro Price: Rs 9.54 lakh-10.64 lakh; The Diesel engine is 1498 cc while the Petrol engine is 1197 cc . It is available with Manual & Automatic transmission.Depending upon the variant and fuel type the XUV 3XO has a mileage of 17.96 to 20.6 kmpl. The XUV 3XO is a 5 seater 3 cylinder car and has length of 3990 mm, width of 1821 mm and a wheelbase of 2600. Specifications, Review and Pricing - What Insider Skip to content What Insider Menu Menu Home Celebrity Singer YouTuber Entertainment News Exam Jobs Sports Auto Tools Calorie Calculator GPA Calculator Mortgage Calculator Federal Pension Calculator Sales Tax Calculator Height Calculator Estimate Your Childs Future Height How To Mahindra XUV 3XO: Specifications, Review and Pricing January 4, 2025 by Santosh Bhunia The Mahindra XUV 3XO continues to be a popular choice in the compact SUV segment, thanks to its blend of stylish design, powerful performance, and cutting-edge features. With its premium interior and robust powertrains, the XUV3OO caters to urban drivers and adventure seekers alike. Mahindra XUV 3XOSpecifications The Mahindra XUV 3XO is offered with both petrol and diesel engine options, making it a versatile choice: Engine Options : 1.2-liter turbo-petrol 1.5-liter turbo-diesel Power Output : Petrol: 110 PS and 200 Nm torque Diesel: 117 PS and 300 Nm torque Transmission : 6-speed manual 6-speed AMT (automated manual transmission) Drivetrain : Front-wheel drive (FWD) Fuel Economy : Petrol: ~17 km/l Diesel: ~20 km/l Mahindra XUV 3XOPrice The Mahindra XUV 3XO is competitively priced, offering great value for its features. Mahindra XUV 3XO on road price is 8,91,603. Base Variant : Starting at 8.50 lakh Top Variant : Up to 14.00 lakh (ex-showroom prices) Mahindra XUV 3XODimensions Despite its compact size, the Mahindra XUV 3XO offers ample cabin space and a commanding road presence: Length : 3995 mm Width : 1821 mm Height : 1627 mm Wheelbase : 2600 mm Ground Clearance : 180 mm Mahindra XUV 3XOInterior and Features The Mahindra XUV 3XO boasts a feature-rich interior that combines comfort, convenience, and technology: Seating : Five-passenger capacity with premium fabric or leatherette upholstery Infotainment : 7-inch touchscreen system with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto Connectivity : Built-in navigation, Bluetooth, and USB ports Climate Control : Dual-zone automatic climate control Sunroof : Available on higher trims Safety Features : Six airbags (top variant) Electronic Stability Program (ESP) ABS with EBD ISOFIX child seat mounts Mahindra XUV 3XOExterior Design The Mahindra XUV 3XO combines bold styling with functional elements: Front : Aggressive grille design with LED projector headlamps and DRLs Wheels : 16-inch alloy wheels (diamond-cut options on higher trims) Tail Lamps : LED wraparound design Paint Options : Multiple vibrant and dual-tone color schemes Mahindra XUV 3XOPerformance The Mahindra XUV 3XO delivers a confident and enjoyable driving experience, with its powerful engines and responsive handling: Ride Quality : Smooth over rough roads, thanks to a well-tuned suspension Steering : Light for city driving, with enough feedback for highways Driving Modes : Multi-drive modes to suit various conditions Mahindra XUV 3XOReview The Mahindra XUV 3XO stands out in the compact SUV market with its impressive safety features, robust performance, and stylish design. Here are its strengths and areas for improvement: Strengths Safety : Leading safety features, including a 5-star Global NCAP rating for adult occupant protection Performance : Powerful diesel engine with class-leading torque Features : Segment-first dual-zone climate control and other premium features Comfort : Spacious cabin with supportive seats and excellent noise insulation Weaknesses Boot Space : At 257 liters, it offers less luggage capacity than competitors Fuel Efficiency : Petrol variants could improve on mileage Price : Top-end variants are on the pricier side for the segment Verdict The Mahindra XUV 3XO is an excellent choice for those seeking a feature-packed, safe, and powerful compact SUV. While it faces competition from models like the Tata Nexon, Kia Sonet, and Hyundai Venue, its unique offerings like a powerful diesel engine and advanced safety features help it carve out its own niche. Whether for daily commutes or weeke', 'images': [{'url': 'https://whatinsider.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/front-left-side-47.webp', 'alt_text': 'Mahindra XUV 3XO', 'width': '789', 'height': '483', 'class': 'attachment-full size-full wp-post-image', 'confidence': 0.8999999999999999}], 'rank': 4}, {'url': 'https://www.autocarindia.com/auto-features/mahindra-xuv-3xo-price-variants-features-explained-431425', 'content': "Mahindra XUV 3XO price, variants, features explained | Autocar India All All Price News Reviews Features Specifications Images Videos All All Price News Reviews Features Specifications Images Videos Signup Login Find a Car Cars Compare Cars New Cars Upcoming Cars Car Price Car Loan Calculator Find a Bike Bikes Compare Bikes New New Bikes New Scooters Upcoming Upcoming Bikes Upcoming Scooters Electric Electric Bikes Electric Scooters Bike Price Bike Loan Calculator News Cars Bikes Motorsports Industry Marketplace Reviews Car First drive / Reviews Comparisons Video reviews Long-term reviews Bike First ride / Reviews Comparisons Video reviews Long-term reviews Features Features Travelogues Blogs Interviews Partner Content Galleries Videos Images Stories Advice Signup Login Change City Close Detect my Current Location Pick from Popular Cities Mumbai Bengaluru Delhi Pune Hyderabad Ahmedabad Chennai Kolkata Home Features Mahindra XUV 3XO price, variants, features explained Mahindra XUV 3XO price, variants, features explained The XUV 3XO recently added new RevX variants, which are offered with two turbo-petrol engine options. Published On Jul 10, 2025 04:21:00 PM 1,06,175 Views Follow us on By Saptarshi Mondal Share - The Mahindra XUV 3XO , formerly XUV300, was launched last year with all-new front and rear designs, a refreshed interior and more features, as well as new powertrain options. Currently priced from Rs 7.99 lakh to Rs 15.79 lakh, ex-showroom India, this Mahindra SUV is available in a total of 12 trim levels (see table below). In this feature, we take a closer look at what features and engine options you get with each trim. Mahindra XUV 3XO petrol variant prices (in Rs, lakh) Petrol-MT Petrol-AT Diesel-MT Diesel-AMT MX1 7.99 - - - RevX M 8.94 - - - RevX M(O) 9.44 - - - MX2 - - 9.99 - MX2 Pro 9.54 10.54 10.64 - MX3 9.74 11.40 10.99 11.79 MX3 Pro 9.99 11.69 11.56 - AX5 11.19 12.69 12.19 12.99 RevX A T-GDI 11.79 12.99 - - AX5L T-GDI 12.62 13.94 - - AX7 T-GDI 12.80 13.99 13.69 14.70 AX7L T-GDI 13.99 15.80 14.99 - Mahindra XUV 3XO variant-wise powertrains The XUV 3XO's engine options include a 111hp, 200Nm, 1.2-litre turbo-petrol engine, 131hp, 230Nm, 1.2-litre TGDI engine and 117hp, 300Nm, and 1.5-litre diesel engine.A 6-speed manual gearbox is standard with these engines.Also, both petrol engines get a 6-speed torque converter automatic gearbox, while the diesel XUV 3XO models come with a 6-speed AMT unit. The 111hp turbo-petrol engine is available on the MX1, RevX M, RevX M(O), MX2, MX2 Pro, MX3, MX3 Pro and the AX5 trims. Moving on, the 131hp turbo-petrol engine is available only on the top four trims - RevX A, AX5 L, AX7 and AX7 L. The diesel engine is available nearly across the board, starting from the fourth-from-base MX2 trim. Here's a look at the variant split of the new XUV 3XO. Mahindra XUV 3XO variant-wise features XUV 3XO MX1 Price: Rs 7.99 lakh; powertrain - 111hp turbo petrol-MT Halogen projector headlamps LED daytime running lamps LED indicator on wing mirrors, LED tail lamps 6 airbags Electronic Stability Control (ESC) 16-inch steel wheels Electrically adjustable wing mirrors Engine start/stop Front armrest with storage 60:40 split rear seat Rear AC vents Adjustable headrest for second row Seat belt reminder for all passengers 3-point seat belt for all passengers XUV 3XO RevX M Price: Rs 8.94 lakh;
